alert.note: Alert for Mono (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 2:04PM PST until December 29 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulation of 1 to 4 inches with up to 6 inches above 8000 feet. * WHERE...Mono County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Widespread travel impacts are already ongoing due to recent heavy snowfall. Plan on more travel impacts including delays and additional potential road closures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Check with CalTrans for the latest road condition information.
info.instruction: Even light snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since it takes longer to stop on slick roadways. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
